descriptions.400: Your request lacks the wisdom needed to proceed. Study the ancient texts, correct your approach, and return when you are ready, brave hero.
descriptions.401: This gate is sealed and requires the proper credentials to pass. Prove your identity to the guardians and they shall grant you passage.
descriptions.402: The treasure you seek requires payment. Gather the necessary rupees from your adventures and return to claim what lies beyond.
descriptions.403: A sacred seal blocks your path. This area is forbidden to all but those chosen by the goddesses. Seek another way forward.
descriptions.404: A true hero faces many obstacles on their journey. This page may be lost, but your courage remains unshaken. Rise, hero, and continue your quest.
descriptions.405: The method you have chosen will not open this path. A hero must be wise and flexible. Try a different approach to overcome this trial.
descriptions.406: The magic you wield is incompatible with this realm. Even the Master Sword cannot cut through all barriers. Seek different tools, hero.
descriptions.408: Time has run out on your quest. A hero must act swiftly when the moment calls. Gather your strength and try again with haste.
descriptions.409: Conflicting forces battle within this space. As a hero, you must restore balance. Refresh your resolve and try again.
descriptions.410: What you seek has been lost to the sands of time. Even the Hero of Legend cannot reclaim what the goddesses have taken. Accept this and move forward.
descriptions.413: Your burden is too great to carry forward. A true hero knows when to lighten their load. Leave behind what you do not need and try again.
descriptions.429: Your spirit is exhausted from too many attempts. A hero must know when to rest. Regain your strength before continuing your quest.
descriptions.500: A dark curse has befallen the server. The sages are working to lift it. Until then, hero, you must be patient and trust in their wisdom.
descriptions.502: The bridge between realms has been destroyed. The ancient builders are working to restore the passage. Return soon, brave one.
descriptions.503: The temple has been sealed for sacred rituals. When the ceremony is complete, the doors shall open once more. Wait with patience, hero.
descriptions.504: The portal collapsed before the connection could be made. Even magic has its limits. Give the wizards time to restore the gateway.
descriptions.default: A true hero faces many obstacles on their journey. This page may be lost, but your courage remains unshaken. Rise, hero, and continue your quest.

footers.400: Even heroes must learn from their mistakes
footers.401: A hero's identity opens many doors
footers.402: Rupees are the key to many treasures
footers.403: Not all paths are meant to be taken
footers.404: Courage need not be remembered, for it is never forgotten
footers.405: A flexible hero survives any trial
footers.406: The right tool makes all the difference
footers.408: Swift action defines a true hero
footers.409: Balance brings peace to the realm
footers.410: What is lost may find new purpose
footers.413: A light step carries you further
footers.500: Darkness always gives way to light
footers.504: All magic has its time to restore
footers.default: Courage need not be remembered, for it is never forgotten
